attributes.title: App made me SICK!?
attributes.review:
Immediately upon opening the app I starting experiencing the following symptoms. (DO NOT DOWNLOAD!):

Fever or chills
Cough
Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
Fatigue
Muscle or body aches
Headache
New loss of taste or smell
Sore throat
Congestion or runny nose
Nausea or vomiting
Diarrhea

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE JUNK 🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app fails at promoting the republican party values endorsed by the Trump campaign and instead encourages the growth of cult-like supporters in a communist manner. His supporters are typically middle to old - aged, racist, homophobic, and very conservative unable to accept that this is a nation of change and progress most possible through democratic values. I myself as a strong liberal, downloaded the app in hopes to understand the opposing parties views but instead I felt as if I was being pressured into a terrorist-type of group? What group you ask? Oh the Republicans of course. Now, I may not agree with this party’s views, we are a united nation and I can at least show basic moral respect to them. However, these “Trumpards” on this app have ruined their party’s reputation and I cannot say I have met one of his supporters who’s views weren’t racist or evident of white supremacy. Lately, he was even ridiculed by teenagers of a prominent social media app named Tik Tok. These teenagers & millennials mass booked tickets to his rally online to voice their opinions in a world where they had little political freedom at their mere young ages. Their activism and dedication to the politics of this nation have instead been ignored and being targeted instead through the recent government decision to consider deleting the app. By silencing the voices of these young citizens, Trump is only revealing the kind of person he is. Hence, I have no choice but to leave a 1 star review for a man with an intelligence I would rate as a 1 star if possible. #settleforbiden2020
